summary: Join Pauly on a thrilling gold mining adventure as he ventures into the wilderness, finds gold, and shares his experiences.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a close-up of a person's hand pointing at a rock formation, accompanied by a green pan and a spoon, suggesting a gold panning activity. The scene transitions to a wider shot of a person squatting by a river, wearing a black hoodie with 'PIONEER PAULY' written on the sleeve, a red and gray beanie, and patterned pants, as they sift through the riverbed. The camera then shifts to an aerial view of a rocky river surrounded by dense forest, emphasizing the natural setting. The video continues with a black screen displaying the text 'PIONEER PAULY' in white, followed by an aerial shot of a car driving along a narrow road through the forest. The scene then shows a serene lake surrounded by trees, with sunlight filtering through the foliage, creating a peaceful atmosphere. The video concludes with a person in the forest, wearing a beanie and adjusting their hood, with the dense greenery in the background, highlighting the outdoor adventure theme.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker excitedly exclaiming, "We haven't even started and we found our first piece of surface gold!" He continues with excitement, "Look at that, another piece of gold." He then describes the spot as "so cool".  The clip transitions to upbeat, driving music, possibly electronic or dance in style, with a positive and energetic tone. The music fades out and a different male speaker begins speaking in an enthusiastic tone, addressing the audience with "Good morning or good afternoon, everyone."

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a man wearing a red and white beanie, a black hoodie with a white silhouette of a person holding a stick, and a gray and white scarf is seen in a forested area. He is holding an orange medical kit and appears to be speaking to the camera. The text "PAULY @pioneerpauly (YouTube/FB/Instagram)" appears on the screen, indicating his social media handles. The man is also wearing a backpack and is surrounded by lush greenery and trees. The scene transitions to an aerial view of the forest, with the text "SUBSCRIBE" and a bell icon appearing on the screen, suggesting viewers subscribe to the channel. The man is then shown walking through the forest, carrying a stick and wearing camouflage pants. The video concludes with a close-up of a moss-covered tree branch, emphasizing the natural environment.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker welcoming the audience and introducing himself as "Polly". He then states that he's going to look for gold along a creek where he first started finding gold, but doesn't expect to find much due to the high water. He finishes by saying that they are "outside" so they should "have some fun". The audio then transitions to a rock and roll song with a driving rhythm, featuring electric guitars and a general energetic mood. A male voice speaks a line about a "nice beard" and another male voice responds with "thanks, it's my face jacket", before the music returns.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a close-up of a small, orange mushroom growing on the forest floor, surrounded by pine needles and twigs. The scene transitions to a person wearing a beanie with the word 'CANADA' on it, a scarf, and a black jacket, standing in front of a rocky stream with trees in the background. The person appears to be speaking, possibly explaining something about the environment or the mushroom. The camera then shifts to a wider shot, showing the person standing on a rocky outcrop overlooking a river flowing through a forested area. The person is holding a camera on a tripod, capturing the scenic view. The video then provides an aerial view of the river, showcasing the rugged terrain and the surrounding greenery. The person continues to speak, gesturing with their hands, and the video concludes with a close-up of the person, emphasizing their facial expressions and the details of their clothing.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with one male speaker addressing the audience, acknowledging a "face jacket might be a little distracting" and shifting the focus to the scenery. He describes the area as "beautiful" with "tons of places to find gold", adding that the river was higher in the past, specifically "millions and millions years ago". In the background, there are faint ambient sounds. Suddenly, a mysterious, suspenseful sound effect plays, followed by the speaker's observations about the beauty and gold prospects of the place.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a man wearing a black hoodie with a white figure on it, a red and white beanie, and a gray scarf is seen in a forested area near a stream. He is engaged in gold panning, using a green pan to sift through the water and rocks. The man is focused on his task, carefully examining the contents of the pan. The forest around him is lush with greenery, and the stream flows gently over rocks. The man's attire and the natural setting suggest a cold environment, and he appears to be enjoying the outdoor activity. The video captures the man's actions and the serene forest backdrop, highlighting the peacefulness of the scene.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with someone speaking in a casual and informative tone, explaining that he is test panning to show that gold can be found away from the river. As he speaks, water splashes lightly. A male voice then says, "getting nice and deep with the spoon", and emphasizes that gold is super heavy, so it is at the bottom of the cracks. Water continues splashing and he mentions he should've brought a smaller pan and mentions the first sign would be black sand. He then exclaims "Bad example, moving on!". The splashing stops and he explains that he didn't bring his scratcher tool for crevice, but he did bring a spoon and a metal bar. He continues by stating, "this is a perfect example why I like coming back to this spot" and proclaims they haven't even started and have already found their first piece of surface gold. The audio ends with a brief instrumental musical interlude consisting of twangy, western-style music, creating a light-hearted and adventurous atmosphere.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a black hoodie with white text on the sleeve, a red and white beanie, and a scarf, engaged in gold panning by a river. He is seen kneeling on rocks, using a green pan to sift through the water and sediment. The man is focused on his task, examining the contents of the pan and the rocks around him. The environment is a natural, rocky riverbank with flowing water and surrounding greenery. The man's actions are deliberate and methodical, indicating his experience and attention to detail in the gold panning process. The video captures the essence of the activity, showcasing the man's interaction with the environment and the tools he uses to search for gold.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with energetic, upbeat music. Then, a man begins speaking with an excited tone, exclaiming, "That is awesome!" He describes finding "a little piece of candy" and digging out a crack "to the best of my ability" with a spoon. He mentions finding a "nice rock that's packed in there," which he interprets as a good sign for finding some "candy".  As he speaks, there are sounds of scraping and rustling in the background. He then exclaims over another piece of gold. The music is very faint behind his speaking.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a person wearing a black hoodie with white text on the sleeve and a red and white knit hat with a pom-pom, exploring a rocky area near a river. The individual is seen using a small tool to dig into the crevices of the rocks, searching for something. The person's hands are shown in close-up as they carefully extract small objects from the rocks, which are then placed into a green bucket. The surrounding environment is lush with greenery, and the river flows gently in the background, creating a serene atmosphere. The person appears focused and methodical in their search, occasionally examining the objects they find. The video captures the detailed process of the person's exploration and the natural beauty of the setting.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip opens with a male speaker expressing excitement, stating "That is too cool." He proceeds to comment on how his perspective has shifted over time, mentioning finding a piece and discussing "underwater sniping." He continues to say that "nothing beats being out here in nature" while a loud industrial noise abruptly cuts through the ambience. As the noise subsides, heavy music with an energetic tone featuring a heavy guitar riff comes in. The male speaker returns, describing "sticky sticky material," expressing that itâ€™s "awesome" and indicates that the area has not been disturbed before, describing finding gold and tightly packed materials. The sound of gravel shifting can be heard. He points out a rock and describes the material that they just dug out from a small crack.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a close-up of a person's hand using a small tool to dig into the ground near a rocky area, revealing a small frog among the rocks and grass. The scene transitions to a wider shot of a person wearing a red and white beanie, a black hoodie, and a scarf, sitting by a river and using a green pan to sift through rocks and water, likely searching for gold. The person is focused on the task, occasionally looking into the pan and adjusting their position. The camera then shifts to a wider view of the river, showcasing its rocky banks and flowing water, before returning to a close-up of the green pan, now containing small rocks and debris. The person continues to sift through the contents of the pan, examining the material closely. The video then shows the person standing up, holding the green pan, and walking away from the river, carrying a backpack and wearing a red and white beanie with the word "CANADA" on it. The person appears to be talking and gesturing with their hands, possibly explaining something about the gold panning process. The video concludes with the person walking through a forested area, with trees and the river visible in the background, indicating a transition from the riverbank to a more wooded environment.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a male speaker expressing excitement about the possibility of finding gold. His tone is enthusiastic and hopeful. This is immediately followed by the sound of machinery operating, most likely gold panning equipment. An upbeat, rhythmic piece of music then starts playing, which sounds like it has rock and roll influences, with drums, and guitar as the main instruments. This music continues in the background as the male speaker resumes talking. He first notes that he's unsure why the water is warm, and then sounds content after finding a little bit of gold. He concludes the audio by saying heâ€™s happy with his findings and recommends the river to other gold prospectors.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a man wearing a black hoodie and a scarf is seen standing on a rocky riverbank, using a long stick to probe the rocks. He is accompanied by a green pan, which he uses to sift through the rocks and water. The man is focused on his task, carefully examining the rocks and the water for any valuable items. He is wearing a beanie with a red and white pattern, and his clothing is adorned with various designs and text, including the word "CANADA" on his beanie. The environment is a natural, outdoor setting with a flowing river and a forested background, creating a serene and peaceful atmosphere. The man's actions are deliberate and methodical, as he sifts through the rocks and water, occasionally pointing out interesting findings to the camera. The video captures the man's excitement and satisfaction as he discovers a small gold nugget, which he proudly shows to the camera. The video concludes with a close-up of the gold nugget in the green pan, highlighting the man's successful find.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male speaker detailing the results of his recent cleaning of a crevice, saying they "found in the second pan", noting it was "not as good as the first one but still pretty consistent." He states he found "some loose bedrock" to allow him to "look deeper", hoping to "find more candy", in a slightly excited tone. He makes a wet, splashing noise. He excitedly notes all of this is "crevice material." He splashes water. He apologizes. He says that "if you want to be a good minor, unlike me, bring more than just a spoon." He wonders how much moving a piece of "bedrock made" of a difference. He concludes that it was "probably none, but probably some." The audio transitions into upbeat reggae music with vocals. Interspersed with the music is the sound of splashing water. The male speaker returns to say, "And we waste our time, that depends who you ask." He assesses the amount of gold recovered, calling it "a little worse, but it's still gold." He then suggests trying more, and makes a whooping sound. Finally, the audio ends with the male speaker describing "that little crevice I just cleaned out."

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a close-up of a rocky surface, where a small green pan filled with dirt is placed. The camera then zooms out to reveal a person wearing a black hoodie with the word "PIONEER" on the sleeve, a red and white beanie, and patterned pants, sitting by a riverbank. The person is seen using the green pan to sift through the riverbed, searching for gold. The background features a serene river surrounded by rocky terrain and trees, creating a peaceful atmosphere. The person appears focused and methodical in their search, occasionally pausing to examine the contents of the pan. The video concludes with a close-up of the person's face, showing a thoughtful expression as they continue their gold panning activity.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker noting "a lot of sand in there," implying the material hasn't been in place long enough to accumulate gold. He believes someone has worked the area previously, despite a pan full of material being present. Rushing water sounds accompany the panning of material, as the speaker notes that he is panning in the most cold river he has ever panned in. The speaker notes that there is not much gold, suggesting "micro poop," and indicating that since he worked it with just a spoon he believes there is still gold left. He then ends the clip by saying it's a free gift for anyone that knows the area, and unfortunately that is all the time he has for today.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man wearing a black hoodie and a red and white beanie, standing in front of a rocky background with moss and water. He is speaking and gesturing with his hands. The scene transitions to a close-up of the man's beanie, with a backpack visible in the background. The man is then shown indoors, in front of a brick wall with a 'Pioneer Pauly' banner, continuing to speak and gesture. The video then shows a close-up of gold nuggets in a pan, followed by the man speaking indoors again. The man is seen holding a gold nugget and speaking, with the 'Pioneer Pauly' banner visible in the background. The video concludes with the man pointing upwards, with social media handles '@PIONEERPAULY' and icons for Snapchat, Instagram, and Facebook displayed on the screen.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip opens with an energetic male voice, remarking on being a bit late, followed by his observation that a moss looked "so cool." He then suggests, "Let's go back to the house and see if we can weigh the gold." Soon after, back in the room, the same speaker summarizes the day: "Fun day, but it was kind of short," and then asks, "Can we weigh the gold?" He answers, "Probably not," transitioning to a more reflective tone, admitting, "Today was more of a hurry up and make another video kind of day, but hey, I ain't complaining." He continues, "Honestly, I don't think this is worth weighing, but we did find gold, and honestly, I found a little more than I expected." Moving on, he mentions his next adventure on the mainland. As the segment shifts towards an outro, he encourages viewers to subscribe and check out his social media and merchandise store. Upbeat electronic music then kicks in, lending a hopeful, promotional mood to the end. The speaker thanks his audience as the music continues, concluding with "Black screen with logo," followed by the line "That's a place to define gold."
